trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateKey"></xref> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
The <xref:System.Windows.TemplateKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).

For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.

The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateKey"></xref>.
See Remarks in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter>.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
The type being evaluated for conversion.
Always returns `false`.
Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateKey"></xref> can be converted to the specified type.
See Remarks in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter>.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
The type being evaluated for conversion.
Always returns `false`.
Attempts to convert the specified object (string) to a <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateKey"></xref>.
See Remarks in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter>.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
Culture specific information.
The object to convert.
Always throws an exception.
source cannot be converted.
Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateKey"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context.
See Remarks in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TemplateKeyConverter>.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
Culture specific information.
The object to convert.
The type to convert the object to.
Always throws an exception.
value cannot be converted.
